headline: Host Hotels & Resorts Named a Global Sustainability Leader on Dow Jones Sustainability World Index for the Sixth Consecutive Year
summary: BETHESDA, Md., Jan. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust (“REIT”), has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index (DJSI World) for the sixth consecutive year, maintaining its position as a global sustainability leader. Additionally, the Company has been included in the DJSI North America for the eighth consecutive year. The DJSI World is comprised of corporate leaders in globa
